title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery      Â                 Special Events   3 Photos  Special Events          Castle Garden Theater Years   3 Photos            Spring at Castle Clinton   4 Photos  Shots taken in the Spring of 2013.  Photos of the exterior of Castle Clinton and Battery Park.            Immigration Years   5 Photos            Castle Clinton/Battery 1812 years   2 Photos            New York Aquarium 1896-1941   3 Photos  Images of Castle Clinton during its 'New York Aquarium' phase.            Civil War  Recruitment at Castle Garden   5 Photos  When Castle Garden was an immigration station a recruitment office was on the grounds to enlist immigrants into the union army during the Civil war
